group_1.textCenter: But…I'm gonna get to meet the uh-steemed@Queen Himiko herself… I gotta keep going…

group_1.textLeft: Toyo has been chosen as a candidate@for succeeding Queen Himiko.
This is a tremendous honor and will be a great@benefit for your village, Sir.

group_1.textRight: Please have Toyo depart for Yamatai@as soon as she's ready.

group_1.narration: That day…@A messenger came to me from the most@powerful region in our queendom…Yamatai.@And I was told that I had been chosen@as Lady Himiko's suck-sessor…
…It was the first time in my life@that I'd ever felt so happy.
Queen Himiko of Yamatai…
When the world was in turmoil,@she used her transcendent@Spirit Arts to guide the people.
The one who succeeded in uniting@many villages and states…
There's no one pursuing the Spirit Arts@who doesn't know her name…
"I wanna be like Lady Himiko…"@There's no one who doesn't think that!
And that goes for me too.
…I don't even know when I first started@practicing the Spirit Arts…
Grampa was the keeper in charge@of protecting the sacred forest,@and Gramma used to be a shrine maiden…@So I was exposed to the Spirit Arts since@before I could even remember…
Well, anyway…@I heard the tales of Queen Himiko and@how she saved and helped so many people…
I wanted to be just like her,@so I devoted myself to the Spirit Arts.
…And for some reason,@whenever I got really into the arts…@it felt like I was surrounded@by a warm, gentle presence…
But Grampa and Gramma@were really against me going@to the main shrine.
Until now, people have said@whenever I get possessed,@I bring about curses…
So I know they were trying to keep me@from going in order to protect me.
But I couldn't help the way I felt.
"...I knew this was your path@from the very first day you@began studying the Spirit Arts…@That you would be taken to the Queen…"
"This is the will of the heavens…@I'm sure of it.@Nothing can prevent your departure…"
In the end, Gramma allowed me to leave,@and convinced Grampa to let me go…

group_1.textCenter: …But still…I wonder what she meant@by all that?

group_1.narration: *Scree!* *Scree!*

group_1.textCenter: Sounds like the cicadas are doing great…@But boy…am I thirsty…
Well, let's see where Spirit Arts point me…@With this terrain…
Wherever there's a bunch of reeds…@there's water…
That's the Spirit Arts…@The fruit of our ancestors' knowledge.

group_1.narration: "It's so cold and yummy!"@"Ahahaha!"

group_1.textCenter: Sure sounds like they're having fun.@I wanna have a drink with them too.
Ah, um…is it okay if I join you guys?

group_1.narration: "Sure!"
"We can't! Don't you guys know?!@She's the child of a Cursed God!"
"No way! Really?!"
"You better not drink water@with a cursed child like that!"
"Or else you're gonna get cursed too!@Run awaaaay!"

group_1.textCenter: …Nahaha… Well, what are you gonna do…
Everyone's scared of the curse…@I just gotta keep hanging on…
Ugh… I don't wanna be alone…@Kaedeee… Momokooo…

group_1.textLeft: …Um…hey there…@Did someone bully you or something…?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Gah! Who do you think you are?!
Don't talk to me!@Just leave me alone.

group_1.textLeft: (First she was crying, now she got angry…@She's got a lotta emotions going on…)

group_1.textRight: …What?

group_1.textLeft: Nahaha… I'm just worried about you.

group_1.textRight: *...Sigh* Okay, basically, someone stole a book@that's really important to me.
I was trying to look for it, but I got lost…
…I guess you guys didn't have them in this era?@Well basically, it's something really valuable.
The one who stole it was this guy wearing@a weird mask.

group_1.textLeft: I-I didn't see anyone like that coming this way…

group_1.textRight: I see… I just gotta hope Kaede and Momoko@have better luck…
We gotta gather up Iroha's concept@as soon as possible...

group_1.textLeft: (Still…that's quite an outfit she's wearing!@Where the heck is she from…?)

group_1.textRight: Hey…is the water drinkable here?@I'm really thirsty…

group_1.textLeft: I-I didn't drink it, so you should be fine!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Please don't get mad at me…@I can wait my turn…

group_1.textRight: No, I have no idea what you're talking about.@Why don't you just drink it?

group_1.textLeft: I'm the child of a Cursed God… People say that if@you stay around me, you'll get koh-rrupted too…

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, I guess this is an era where people@believe in that kind of occult nonsense.
Nothing, just me babbling.
Look, I don't believe in this Cursed God crap,@so you oughta drink too.
C'mon!
…Wh-what's up?
Huh…?@The heck are you crying for?
…Weirdo.
